availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Quincy Gouge (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Madison Gouge. Married to Eliza Ann Clark Gouge in Grant County, Kentucky on July 6, 1850. Father of John C Gouge, Sylvester Gouge, Henry C Gouge, and Orthiel D Gouge. Farmer in Grant County in 1850. Farmer in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "John Quincy Gouge (12 May 1828-25 Sept 1873)," Memorial #46953044, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/46953044 (accessed May 28, 2020).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 307B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film 000266220, p. 408.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, WIlliamstown, p. 969.
